product_overview: A web-based platform integrating Kakao Maps and advanced LLM-powered natural language search, enabling users to discover, filter, review, and share local places with rich geographic and contextual data.
core_goals: Provide seamless discovery of local places via map integration and natural language search.
Support advanced filtering by region, category, and event tags to refine search results.
Enable detailed place information views, responsive UI for desktop and mobile.
Allow users to add, edit, and manage places with robust CRUD functionality syncing with Supabase backend.
Facilitate a community-driven review system for places.
Support image upload with optimization using Cloudinary.
Ensure social sharing via KakaoTalk and other platforms with accurate metadata.
Maintain high performance, UX quality, and fault tolerance across various edge cases and network conditions.
Enable detailed logging and analytics for search and click events to monitor usage and improve the platform.
key_features: Kakao Map integration with dynamic markers and interaction syncing with place previews and details.
LLM (Google Gemini)-based natural language search pipeline converting queries into structured filters.
Hierarchical filtering system supporting Province, Region, SubRegion, and CategoryMain, CategorySub with exclusion capabilities.
Place detail display adapting between sidebar on desktop and full page on mobile.
Place CRUD operations with validation and synchronization to Supabase PostgreSQL, including optional fields like features, tags, and event tags.
Community review system supporting feature tagging, filtering, and proper association.
Image upload and compression with Cloudinary integration, including UI feedback and optimization.
Responsive layout with breakpoint management and gesture-enabled bottom sheets for mobile UX.
Event tag filtering and event banners highlighting special places.
KakaoTalk and multi-platform sharing with deep linking and metadata management.
Robust error handling and user feedback for network failures and edge cases.
Performance optimizations including code splitting, lazy loading, and minimized re-rendering.
Detailed logging of search queries and click events for analysis and troubleshooting.
user_flow_summary: User searches for places using natural language queries or filter selectors (region, category, event tags).
Filtered results are displayed as paginated location cards and visualized with markers on Kakao Map.
User clicks markers or location cards to view detailed place information in sidebar (desktop) or full page modal (mobile).
User can add new places or edit existing ones via modals with field validation and sync to backend.
Community members write and read reviews linked correctly to places, supporting feature tags and sorting.
User uploads images with file preview and compression, receiving UI feedback on upload status.
Users share places via KakaoTalk or other social platforms with correct link deep linking and meta content.
The system logs search and click activity with detailed structured data.
Underlying UI components respond fluidly to viewport changes, supporting mobile gestures and desktop layouts.
validation_criteria: Place exploration flow correctly navigates: filtering → list → map → external deep link without errors across PC and mobile.
LLM natural language search correctly parses queries and returns accurate, real location data without fabricating entries.
Filter cascades correctly through hierarchical region and category levels without confusing UX.
Map markers render correctly per category with interaction syncing to place previews and details.
Place CRUD operations validate input, reflect changes immediately, handle related reviews appropriately, and maintain data consistency.
Community review submission and display maintain correct linkage and sorting, and handle place removal gracefully.
Image upload flow manages user feedback and optimizes image delivery while handling upload failure scenarios.
Responsive layouts switch cleanly at 768px viewport width, with bottom sheet gestures and scroll behaviors working smoothly without conflict.
Event tag filtering and banners activate and deactivate correctly relative to event status and data.
Social sharing triggers platform-specific behavior correctly with accurate metadata.
Error states from API failures are gracefully handled with user guidance and retry options.
Empty or malformed data scenarios do not break UI and provide helpful feedback or fallback behavior.
Performance metrics meet expectations with lazy loading, minimal re-rendering, and smooth animations especially on mobile.
Search and click logs accurately record user interactions and maintain referential integrity between entities.
